scripts.build:webpack: rm -rf build && webpack --config webpack.config.js && mkdirp build/todomvc-common && cp src/index.html build/index.html && cp learn.json build/learn.json && cp node_modules/todomvc-common/base.* build/todomvc-common/ && cp node_modules/todomvc-app-css/index.css build/todomvc.css
scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs build/app.js --pure-funcs classCallCheck -c unsafe,collapse_vars,evaluate,loops,keep_fargs=false,pure_getters,unused,dead_code,warnings -m -o build/app.js --source-map url='app.js.map' && npm run open
